title: Patch Notes
content: with her trademark spells even if Shadowheart is Wild-Shaped. The enemy wolf summon in the combat near the sandy dock west of the South Span Checkpoint can no longer use Help and its summoner now has Hunter's Mark. Cazador's bats and werewolves are now immune to Ghastly Fumes, which his ghast-like Fallen Gur Hunters spawn each turn. Fixed a bug where, if Cazador is already dead and his spawn can fight back, killing a spawn during combat could restart the combat. Casting Dominate Person on Dolor
